title: 100 words
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Five am trains
And broken chains
I called you every afternoon
Forrest Gump
And the hurricane trails
Though we never followed through
[Chorus]
Do you have a 100 words for me?
'Cause I have only three
And you couldn’t even sing for me
And I keep on writing these songs
Over and over
And I keep getting closer to you
[Verse 2]
A lover’s home
Is never shown
It’s never known, to the common folk
You called me over
Said my name three times over
But you never looked me in the eyes
[Chorus]
Do you have a 100 words for me?
'Cause I have only three
And you couldn’t even sing for me
And I keep on writing these songs
Over and over
And I keep getting closer, to you
[Chorus]
Do you have a 100 words for me?
'Cause I have only three
And you couldn’t even sing for me
And I keep on writing these songs
Over and over
And I keep getting closer, to you
And I keep on writing these songs
Over and over
As I keep getting older, with you

title: A Shot of Alcohol
lyrics:
I'm, a shot of alcohol for you
The scary monster in your dreams
A cigarette lighter when you're blue
I'm the broken guitar you threw away
The pretty song you never made
I'm the last step of your ruse
Your eyes in mine, by the fire under the moonlight
I have tried, to stare back into your reflection
I thought you'd never say goodbye
That you'd be with me when I cry
But I'm just another one of your
Free times, free times

title: All I Need
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Would you break away
If I tied my heartstrings to you, baby?
And every day
I wanna see your perfect body right beside me, baby
[Chorus]
I want you to know that I did try
To open your heart and break in inside
I want you to know that I believe
I'd heal all your wounds and take all your tears
'Cause, baby, you're all I need
[Verse 2]
Do you believe?
I wanna love you like the storm that lives inside me, baby
Pull me deep in your sea
I wanna swim through your veins
I wanna move through you, baby
[Chorus]
I want you to know that I did try
To open your heart and break in inside
I want you to know that I believe
I'd heal all your wounds and take all your tears
'Cause, baby, you're all I need
[Post-Chorus]
Baby, you're all I need
Yeah, baby, you're all I need
[Chorus]
I want you to know that I did try
To open your heart and break in inside
I want you to know that I believe
I'd heal all your wounds and take all your tears
'Cause, baby, you're all I need
[Outro]
Baby, you're all I need
Baby, you're all I need
Baby, you're all I need
And I could be all you need

title: Artist
lyrics:
She thinks of herself
As an artist
She walks to the show
Like a queen
Her demeanour is slick
And she can turn you down with a flick of her fingers
If she feels it
She thinks of herself
As a lady
She walks by the aisle
With grace
Her hair flows down her neck
And she might even give you a peck on your lips
If she feels it
She thinks of herself
As an artist
Ooooh, she’s an artist

title: Be at Ease
lyrics:
I'm glaring wildly at traces of love
Staring blankly at signs from above
Breathe under the sun, living without kin or kith
We are all looking for someone to be at ease with
And wined and dined, a trollop at nine
Believe it or not, she’s doing fine
Often, everything that we know turns out a myth
We are all looking for someone to be at ease with
Ease, to be at ease
To be at ease
To be at ease
A drop of luck, a pinch of fate
Lift your heart, it’s never too late
Sow your blood, reap your flesh, hold steady your scythe
We are all looking for someone to be at ease
And we are all looking for someone to be at peace

title: Big Suprise
lyrics:
This house, it breathes tonight
We are, the blood and veins, we took the reins
For now, the time has come
It's not a big surprise
We fought, in many wars
We proved our love, we proved our faith
For now, it's gone, I know it's wrong
It's not a big surprise
So sleep
Sleep tight, tonight
You know
Tomorrow will be bright
I know it's cold
My hands are warm
My heart is strong
It's not a big surprise
There are a thousand dreams
That lie within the sheets, in old LPs
For now, they lie asleep
It's not a big surprise
We smoke our breath away, this foggy night
Foresight is not on our side
It's not the pain, that's on my mind
It's just the big surprise
So sleep
Sleep tight, tonight
You know
Tomorrow will be bright
I know it's cold
My hands are warm
My heart is strong
It's not a big surprise

title: Bloom
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I know love when I see it bloom
I know feelings when I see them in a room
Yeah, they just need me and you
I keep waiting for you even when you tell me I'm a loon
[Chorus]
Don't you see? Time and time, I fail
And lately, I've been talking to myself again
[Verse 2]
A bit too much, but it isn't fair
'Cause I don't have your eyes to stare into
I dare you to compare your embrace to anywhere
I still need you, I don't care
[Chorus]
Don't you know? I've been on my own far too long
If you're on your way, I'll stick around
[Verse 3]
I couldn't sleep and now I can
I still need to feel your touch and hold your hands
Yeah, I want you all around me
I keep it in, but I write it down
[Chorus]
Don't you know I've been on my own far too long?
If you're on your way I'll stick around

title: Chahe Ya Na Chahe
lyrics:
Tere sapno ke baadal pe
Sundar sama hai mehfil jawan
Hawaaon ne cheekha hai shaamil bhi shaam
Mukaddar Sikandar ka bhi maan'na hai
Ke mera chhota sa ghar hai yahaan
Tu chahe ya na chahe jaan
Jo parde uthe tu kahan main yahin hu
Main karvate badalta hu sota nahin hu
Tu sapno ki raani main raaton ka raaja
Tu bholi kahaani, main aandhi ka waada
Hai kiski ye marzi ye kisne likha
Tu chahe ya na chahe jaan
Tu chahe ya na chahe jaan
Tu chaahe ya na chaahe jaan
Aaja samaa mein taare na dekhe
Honsh udaane waale raahein na milein
Rakth hi rahe laal siyaahi ki cheethi
Bheege kagaz ka adhura soona fasana
Hai laal, neeli, peeli ye mann ki tarangein
Sab hanste hai mujhpe
Phir jalte sabhi hain
Hawaaon ne cheekha hai shaamil bhi shaam
Mukaddar Sikandar ka bhi maan'na hai
Ke mera chhota sa ghar hai yahaan
Tu chaahe ya na chaahe jaan
Tu chaahe ya na chaahe jaan
Tu chaahe ya na chaahe jaan

title: Co2
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Maybe I was wrong and you were right
But I don't really wanna have this fight
I just wanna feel like I belong
And every time my heart swings back to you
You are my morning and my truth
And all that I can do is sing this song
It ain't that long, hm
[Chorus]
And nothing says "I love you" like your eyes
Fill my lips with carbon dioxide
I just wanna feel like I deserve you
'Cause you deserve me
Baby, it's the way that you can see
What I miss and what I can never be
I just wanna feel like I deserve you
'Cause you deserve me
[Verse 2]
Maybe you were wrong and I was right
I don't care, won't you stay another night?
I just need some time to be myself
I couldn't say "I need you" on that night
When you left and I lost all track of time
I just want you close so I can feel you
Can you feel me? Mm
[Chorus]
And nothing says "I love you" like the words
That were never said, but could be heard
If only there was peace around us, baby
You would hear me
And maybe it's the way that lovers do
I just want for me what I want for you
Only with the sun above us maybe
You would see me
[Post-Chorus]
Mm, mm, mm
[Bridge]
And even if you leave, I may be fine
'Cause my heart, it has its own design
And even if you never see it, baby
You're all that I need

title: Cold Shoulders
lyrics:
We crossed our desires, we crossed our eyes
In tokens, in charms, in smoke, in kind
We spent it all
We buried our cause
We straightened our spine
Swayed and fettered, swooned and crowned
Even the bliss is pain somehow
I read up on glances and tethered to chances
Eloped with the sounds
How did you perceive me
How did you complete me
Cold shoulders apart
Sway into my arms
Slip into my heart
I stumbled with grace in my stride
I cordoned my hopes to one side
I slipped on my swerves
I balanced on curves
I slowed down my ride
Oh when you were faded, you looked away
When you were spoken, when you refrained
I called in my favours
I called in my troops
I left you alone
Tired of being only
The rain, the sun, the lonely
Cold shoulders apart
Sway into my arms
Slip into my heart

title: Face
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Time is just a place that we never wanna disgrace
I just wanna face the world with my shut eyes
I thought this could be the one time that I escape
But nothing really seems to change with the sunrise
[Chorus]
I felt always like a fool, if only I could lose me
Leave me clueless in my shoes so nothing can confuse me
All I needed was a touch of sazeracs that choose me
Leave me naked in my clothes with the folks that always usе me
[Verse 2]
But maybe this is just a game and I nеver knew how to play it
I just wanna face it all with my shut eyes now
Maybe I try my luck and take a peek
All I wanna see is miles of blue skies now
[Chorus]
I stay in just to contain the thoughts that do consume me
I just wanted to stay sane, why do I think I'm vain please
All I needed was the love of sazeracs to snooze me
Leave me naked to my soul and him and me will soon sleep
[Verse 3]
Stripped down to my glass nerves, they crack in a split
So I can see my blood move as it slips right out
I could sing this once, twice, thrice, and again, but maybe
This can only end with my knees and my tongue tied down
[Chorus]

I just wanna face the world with my shut eyes

I just wanna face the world with my shut eyes

title: Favorite Peeps
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I slept with my toes between all my sheets
It feels like I never could really keep up
With all of my hands and all of my feet
I need all the warmth I can get from my
Favorite peeps, I keep them around
I have to stay strong, but I wanna give up
[Verse 2]
My fire is strong, but sometimes I leap
Into the pits of imaginary slumps
With my new kicks that I never picked
I need all the heart I can get from my
Favorite loves, I need them with me
I should stay strong, but I wanna give up
[Bridge]
It's just love, lust, then lonely, no time to be alone
Don't know what I have, but I want what I don't
May slip, slit my wrist with a call on my phone
Don't know what I need, what I have, I don't see
They said, "give time" (Timе)
(Time) Time
(Time) timе
[Verse 3]
They take me around, they tuck me to sleep
They keep me in check when I wanna break in
To my own self, within my debris
I need all the hugs I can get from my
Favorite bugs, they need me too
I need to stay strong, so I don't let them know
[Outro]
Patience is fatal, but pain is not weak
Patience is fatal, but pain is not weak

Tune kaha, maine sun lia
Tune kaha, maine sun lia
[Verse 2]
Shoor aya aise to, tu befikar hain kyu?
Sharmai manzile tu bekhabar hain kyu?
Rango se dosti hai maine bhi kari
Kya hai tu sochati mujhko bhi to bta
[Chorus]
Tune kaha, maine sun lia
Tune kaha, maine sun lia
Tune kaha, maine sun lia
Tune kaha, maine sun lia
[Bridge]
Phikar ke din aur raatein
Dhaal gaya suraj kaha
Phizool ki thi baatein
Kho gaye the hum jane kaha
[Chorus]
Tune kaha, maine sun lia
Tune kaha, maine sun lia
[Verse 3]
Rozana meri to hain daasatan nayi
Phurze poorane hain par shock hain kayi
Taaro ki roshani ne dikhaya raasta
Par maim mukal gaya tu sath jo yahi

title: Voh
lyrics:
Mere khwabon ko, banaye jo
Meri hakikat ko, sajaye jo
Jaane kahaan hai voh
Jaane kahaan hai voh
Mere iraade kaun badalta hai
Mere khayalon ko, banaye jo
Jaane kahaan hai voh
Jaane kahaan hai voh
Tere hone se hai jahaan
Gune rangeen aasman
Tera suraj, tera chaand
Kya pata
